website_summaries.verdict: This beloved toy’s enduring appeal, beautiful array of shapes, lovely illustrations, and durable design will impress kids and monkeys alike.
pros: Charming illustrations from the Curious George books line its exterior
cons: There are more complex kaleidoscope visuals available

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Given to my grandchildren as a gift along with other items. This was the hit. And still is two months later.
customer_reviews.author: jbfrost

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly robust
customer_reviews.text: Grandaughter has dropped it on teh hard wood floor a bunch of times. I figure, ' well that's a gonna" Nope, still working
customer_reviews.author: Theresa H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, wish it were sturdier
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toy for kids, at a reasonable price. ( Also fun for adults to zone out with. ) The inside materials are first-rate and the effects beautiful. However, the comments about the lack of sturdiness are accurate. It arrived with a dent already in it. I added another while trying to work out the first one. The dents don't affect the performance, and my granddaughter doesn't care about them. But a metal toy ought to be able to stand up better than this does. One star removed for that.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sloane

customer_reviews.title: as I had one as a child and very much enjoyed it wanted my granddaughters to have as well
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried about quality after reading some of the reviews. However, as I had one as a child and very much enjoyed it wanted my granddaughters to have as well. They will recieve them in their Easter baskets. The quality seems good, sturdy enough and very similar to what I had myself as a child. I tried them out myself after recieving and brought back great memories of time spent viewing the beautiful shapes and colors!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth zappitello

customer_reviews.title: Kaleidoscopes and monkeys, a perfect combination
customer_reviews.text: I loved playing with kaleidoscopes as a kid, so when we had our own kids, we thought it would be a good idea to buy one for them. They absolutely loved it and played with it all the time. It's good for kids when they are around 2-5 years old, after that they will move on to other things. This particular product is of good quality at a reasonable price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: val321

customer_reviews.title: Unique, fun and useful gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as party favors for my little one's birthday. Kids from 2 to 10 year olds loved it, and their parents too. Unique and fun gift for all. The packaging was okay - they could've used more bubble pack to hold the pieces together tight in the Amazon box. Yet no piece was damaged or broken
customer_reviews.author: Prachee

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: An old fashion toy that was new again at my 3 year old twin grand babies birthday party!! They loved it and so did many others!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Nice kaleidoscope - very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little kaleidoscope. I purchased this for my local library's children's room where I know it will be a fan favorite! Lovely to look at both inside and out!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Jones Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Just turned two year old not ready but it is nice
customer_reviews.text: Thought that my son would love this for his second birthday. He is a bigger boy for his age but has a hard time reaching to the end to turn it while holding it to his face. If we help him, he enjoys it for less than a minute. He dropped it once and the tin dented but doesn't interfere with its viewing. I am sure that he'll love it in a little while.
customer_reviews.author: bag

customer_reviews.title: Great price, sturdy toy, 4 year old loves it and has not broken it yet.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is great. It is sturdy (my 4 year old son hasn't broken it!). It is fun and he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a stocking stuffer for my 2.5 yr old. He really enjoys playing with it. My husband was very impressed with the quality and the bead selection inside of it, there's this "s" shaped bead that really makes for some unique results. My son really loves curious george and was really happy play with this toy. Overall a really great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ash B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I was a little skeptical of this toy as the patterns are made of beads and I remember old school kaleidoscopes being made with some sort of glitter paper but this is WAY better. The colors and patterns are BEAUTIFUL! I probably enjoy this toy as much as my kid... I might have to buy one for myself as it's a nice way to relax and spend a free 5-10 minutes of your time...seriously.
customer_reviews.author: 617mommy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT - DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: These kaleidoscopes, I think, will last much longer being made of tin. I bought them for my 3 year old twins who I hope will be fascinated with them (as much as I was then they arrived!). I received my item packaged very well, and quickly. I enjoy doing business on Amazon because I can always count on getting great service!
customer_reviews.author: mimito5x

customer_reviews.title: Great first kaleidoscope
customer_reviews.text: This is great first kaleidoscope for little ones. It has a fun retro look and feel and has held up well to my energetic toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle Louw

customer_reviews.title: It is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Got this to stop 2 year old from putting other toys into her eyes. This was fine, but she got bored of it quickly. Decent durability for the price.
customer_reviews.author: aperson

customer_reviews.title: For our 2 yr old granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, not cheap plastic or cardboard. They upgraded my shipping at no extra cost and personally contacted myself via email..wonderful company. Just remember if they are young to only use under supervision. Requires no batteries and does not need and on and off switch.
customer_reviews.author: winston

customer_reviews.title: Decent Value for the $
customer_reviews.text: Decent value for the money - you get what you pay for. Didn't want to spend a lot of money on a novelty item for a young child and this suited my needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandson. He will get many years of pleasure from this. It is made well and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Not as cool as the ones growing up but
customer_reviews.text: I likes the style how it’s tin and reminds me from when I was a kid, I just remember them being a little bit cooler but I think my 3 yr old will have a kick out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Torres

customer_reviews.title: nice item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift that you don't see too much of anymore. I loved kaleidoscopes as a kid and it's a nice simple toy which I think kids can use more of these days. It was a good price and I have a huge curious george fan
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well Done!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came very well packaged. It looked like nobody had even touched it. I haven't given it as a gift or inspected it yet. That is why I'm giving it a 4 instead of a 5. Looks great though!
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun. Much like one I had as a child. We expect that our little Curious George lover will love it Christmas morning,
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Basic meets Classic
customer_reviews.text: It's your basic kaleidoscope brightly designed with the theme of a classic storybook character. It was bought for a 2 year-old and she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: The Lotus Eater

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a sturdy toy, the patterns and colors are very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Fed

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a "toy" but I use it all the time; a calming tool. Light and Color; good for the brain. Truly it is.
customer_reviews.author: C.R. of Solvang

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves this. He brings it to me to show off what he's looking at, and gets excited about watching changing designs and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Leona

customer_reviews.title: Real Curious George Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I am a sucker for a good Curious George toy. This kaleidoscope has great colors and the little shapes inside are unusual and really suggest the feel of this precocious monkey's stories. The movement is smooth and it seems very well made. All-in-all: a terrific price for a really fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: writer603

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: think I was more fascinated with it than my son
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: durable and good quality, lots of fun for my 3 year old, he really likes (especially since Curious George is also painted on it). I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EyeDocMom

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 19 month baby and he loves it. The kaleidoscope has a prettily painted tin exterior and nice bright beads inside. The base is made of plastic, not glass, so it doesn't break when dropped repeatedly on a tile floor. The painted tin has not scratched or dented. It has not succumbed to any amount of twisting or other types of toddler abuse. A fun toy for any die hard Curious George fan.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Lark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, introduce your child to the magic that is kaleidoscope.
customer_reviews.author: JBC

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves a kaleidoscope
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun...I had one when I was a child eons ago and these are still fun. The "just turned 4 year old" really enjoys it. I would not hesitate to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: it is very hard to get a nice or pleasing permutation
customer_reviews.text: Meh product. Cheaply made and could not hold the attention of my 5 year old daughter even though I fully expected her to be mesmerized by it. Since the plastic beads are of extremely low quality and the diffuser screen blocks too much light, it is very hard to get a nice or pleasing permutation. The hard edges of the "jewels" make them stick so you have to turn quite a bit for a change. I remember when I was little, 50 years ago, and had one, I had endless fun fun with it, but this was not the case with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wonderful patterns for the price, it will be with me at the next burn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute retro toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun but easily put down for more active toys.Well built easy to use but a little too slow for a 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: W.A. MAISEY

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: was cheaply made fell out of the package when opened and bent.
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves this. Quality construction and a beautiful display inside. Reminds me of playing with the tin kaleidoscope at my grandmothers house as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Well-made toy
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the larger size and solid tin construction. It is a good purchase. I would only ask them to change their picture and not show 2 kaleidoscopes in it, when in fact they sell and ship only one for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ivo

customer_reviews.title: Great for a child
customer_reviews.text: Great for a child. I'm glad to add it to our small collection even though the images are so so.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sue Barnes

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: kids loved them. arrived on time and as described. - - - - - - - - - - -
customer_reviews.author: F. Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Good toy/ bad step stool.
customer_reviews.text: This was really great until my three year old stood on it, and it almost cut her foot in half. It came apart at the seam and exposed a very sharp metal edge. I would give it a lower rating if I actually thought anyone else's toddler would try to use it for a step stool.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Kaleidoscope
customer_reviews.text: Just like when I was a kid-same fun stuff inside to watch spin around. My 2 1/2 yr. old son loves the stars.
customer_reviews.author: Music lover

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: this is very durable and the colors are bright and shiny. My daughter loves George so this was perfect! :)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, but Dented
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Curious George, so he’s collecting all things that are Curious George. I loved kaleidoscopes as a kid, so had to get him one. I’m just disappointed that this one has a big dent in it. It’s still functional, which is why I will say it’s average (3 stars).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

customer_reviews.title: the best toy in the world
customer_reviews.text: my granchild loves this and plays with it all the time.there are some more curious george toys that amazon sells that i want to send to my grandbaby (age 4)
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My son liked it for a bit and picks it up every once in a while. It is really cute. Maybe when he gets older (he is three) he might be more interested. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: tay4949

customer_reviews.title: Visual fin
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have monkey pictures. However the quality was very good. My grandson liked it a lot. Yea!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Attocknie

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool gift for a four year old. He was quite taken with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to show my son, but when I opened package it was bent. Very disappointing ! Very cute , but they should really make it sturdier! If it does Not even hold up in shipping!
customer_reviews.author: juju

customer_reviews.title: disappointment with kaleidoscope
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed as I thought the pictures inside of the kaleidoscope would have something to do with curious George.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mae Pembleton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the cheapness of this kaleidoscope would not keep a child older than three entertained.
customer_reviews.author: BF

product_meta.title: Curious George Tin Kaleidoscope - only one included
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Kaleidoscopes, from the Greek word for "beautiful form to see", have been fascinating children since their invention in 1816. And they still create wonder and delight in today's child. This tin Kaleidoscope from Schylling Toys, the world leader in traditional toys and classic fun lets children see the world in a new and more artistic way. Point toward the light and experience a swirling explosion of brilliant colors. Twist the separate turning cell and create vibrant and fantastical moving color patterns. Each turn creates a magical, intricate and iridescent mosaic that will dazzle and delight. Made out of metal, you get the timeless tin toy feel that is lacking in plastic and cardboard kaleidoscopes. As educational as it is entertaining, this classic kaleidoscope featuring Curious George, the world's most beloved mischievous monkey, fosters creativity, imagination and constant fascination.
feature_bullets: The classic tin Kaleidoscope featuring Curious George, the world's most beloved Monkey, whose adventures have been delighting children for generations
Each turn creates a magical, intricate and iridescent mosaic that will dazzle and delight every child
Made of metal for a timeless tin toy feel, it is decorated with art taken directly from the book series
Educational and entertaining, fostering creativity, imagination and constant fascination

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
